channel.title: Haven and Hearth
channel.description:
Haven and Hearth, commonly know as HnH is a Sandbox game (Free will) with a perma-death sense to it. When your character dies you must reincarnate, losing progress you made. Worlds also reset approximately every 1-2years. Alike runescape, "Skilling" (crafting, farming) and PvP are the majority of this game.
Website: [url=http://www.havenandhearth.com/portal/]http://www.havenandhearth.com/portal/[/url] Wiki page: [url=http://ringofbrodgar.com/wiki/Haven_and_Hearth_Wiki]http://ringofbrodgar.com/wiki/Haven_and_Hearth_Wiki[/url]
You can build your cities, for example, [url=http://zoom.it/Nr4M]http://zoom.it/Nr4M[/url] That is Pandemonium from the third world (Currently in world 6) Another example of what can be built (You can build whatever you like of course) is Sodom's village [url=http://zoom.it/y0se]http://zoom.it/y0se[/url]
Whether you're in a strong faction like Sodom, Pande or any new ones in the worlds to come and current world, or a simple hermit, even a vault dweller! [url=http://zoom.it/y0se]http://zoom.it/y0se[/url] you probably face hardships such as raids (PVP, where others attack you&your village/Hermitry), obtaining skills through the Learning points system, making food and keeping crops to something rare like spawning a troll and needing a team to kill it.
The wiki and Forums should give anyone with an interest a better understanding of the game and community.

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

  1. Bugs are fixed routinely.
  2. Ruskies are no longer a majority in the game.
  3. Developments will occur after Salem release, so get a feel for the game now.

Read full topic

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

someone2:

It was fun before Russians came. They fucked up the whole game with abusing bugs. And the developer somehow managed to screw up the server, there are very frequent lag spikes of about 10 seconds. And it is pretty much abandonware, as the developers are working on another game. “Salem Online”.

Well this will probably make me quit then, I don’t like playing when the developers aren’t supporting the game anymore and stuff won’t get fixed.

Read full topic

It is laggy, because the server is a little messed up at the moment. But it is a fun game.

Tell me what you all think of the game?

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

Haven and Hearth, commonly know as HnH is a Sandbox game (Free will) with a perma-death sense to it. When your character dies you must reincarnate, losing progress you made. Worlds also reset approximately every 1-2years.
Alike runescape, “Skilling” (crafting, farming) and PvP are the majority of this game.

Website: http://www.havenandhearth.com/portal/
Wiki page: http://ringofbrodgar.com/wiki/Haven_and_Hearth_Wiki

You can build your cities, for example, http://zoom.it/Nr4M
That is Pandemonium from the third world (Currently in world 6)
Another example of what can be built (You can build whatever you like of course) is Sodom’s village http://zoom.it/y0se

Whether you’re in a strong faction like Sodom, Pande or any new ones in the worlds to come and current world, or a simple hermit, even a vault dweller! http://zoom.it/y0se
you probably face hardships such as raids (PVP, where others attack you&your village/Hermitry), obtaining skills through the Learning points system, making food and keeping crops to something rare like spawning a troll and needing a team to kill it.

The wiki and Forums should give anyone with an interest a better understanding of the game and community.

Read full topic
